title: Word Hunt: Changes in Matter
clues: Solid - a state of matter that has a definite shape, size, and volume.
Liquid - a state of matter that does not have definite shape and size but has definite volume.
Gas - a state of matter that does not have definite volume and shape.
Flow - this is an ability that a liquid has.
Volume - amount of space that an object occupies.
Texture - the feel or appearance of the surface of an object. Different solids may have smooth or rough textures.
Surface - The outer part or appearance of an object.
tts: Welcome to the exciting Word Hunt game! Let's get started! In this word hunt, your mission is to find hidden words like solid, liquid, gas, flow, volume, texture, and surface.
